name: Alan Grunt
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021)

Controls (Two Player - Local Coop):

  • Left Player Keyboard: WASD + E
  • Right Player Keyboard: ARROW KEYS + ENTER
  • Gamepad: not yet available

1. Read the blueprint of the missing dino bones in the top bar

2. Place the right amount of missing bones onto the lift platform

3. Turn the winch to uplift the platform and deliver the bones

4. Score as many points as you can - time is running

Credits

  • 3D Art and Technical Art: https://pumpchin.itch.io/
  • Programming: https://jinxedbyte.itch.io/
  •  Music and SFX: https://heinzrink.itch.io/

Software used

  • Unity
  • Maya
  • ZBrush
  • Substance Painter
  • Affinity
  • Rider

Assets

  • BitGem https://shop.bitgem3d.com/
  • GUI Pro Kit https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/gui-pro-kit-casual-game-176695
  • Easy Character Movement  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/easy-character-movement-...
  • Easy Outline https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/easy...
